articles.title: Sam Altman Warns Of AI Bot Surge On Elon Musk's X, Revives 'Dead Internet' Fears As Feud With xAI Escalates
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman raised concerns about the growing presence of artificial intelligence-generated accounts on Elon Musk's X platform.
articles.translated_title: Sam Altman Warns Of AI Bot Surge On Elon Musk's X, Revives 'Dead Internet' Fears As Feud With xAI Escalates
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman raised concerns about the growing presence of artificial intelligence-generated accounts on Elon Musk's X platform.

articles.title: DeepSeek Targets AI Agent Release by End of Year to Rival OpenAI
articles.summary: DeepSeek is developing an artificial intelligence model with more advanced AI agent features to compete with US rivals like OpenAI in a newer frontier of the technology, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.translated_title: DeepSeek Targets AI Agent Release by End of Year to Rival OpenAI
articles.translated_summary: DeepSeek is developing an artificial intelligence model with more advanced AI agent features to compete with US rivals like OpenAI in a newer frontier of the technology, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Trump Says US 'Easily Beating' China In The AI Race, Compares It To Space Race And Cold War-Credits His Tariffs, Energy Policies
articles.summary: President Donald Trump asserted that the United States is currently leading the artificial intelligence (AI) race against China. He attributed this to the impact of tariffs and the nation's energy policies.
articles.translated_title: Trump Says US 'Easily Beating' China In The AI Race, Compares It To Space Race And Cold War-Credits His Tariffs, Energy Policies
articles.translated_summary: President Donald Trump asserted that the United States is currently leading the artificial intelligence (AI) race against China. He attributed this to the impact of tariffs and the nation's energy policies.

articles.title: Exclusive: Chinese firms still want Nvidia chips despite government pressure not to buy, sources say
articles.summary: Alibaba , ByteDance and other Chinese tech firms remain keen on Nvidia's artificial intelligence chips despite regulators in Beijing strongly discouraging them from such purchases, four people with knowledge of procurement discussions said.
articles.translated_title: Exclusive: Chinese firms still want Nvidia chips despite government pressure not to buy, sources say
articles.translated_summary: Alibaba , ByteDance and other Chinese tech firms remain keen on Nvidia's artificial intelligence chips despite regulators in Beijing strongly discouraging them from such purchases, four people with knowledge of procurement discussions said.

articles.title: How much is AI actually affecting the workforce?
articles.summary: There’s been a lot of big talk about how artificial intelligence is going to replace white collar workers. But what data do we actually have around AI’s impact on the workforce? Today on the show, we speak to an expert who has measured one aspect of these changes. She tells us how this moment in AI compares to the Industrial Revolution. Related episodes: AI creates, transforms, and destroys… jobs The golden ages of labor and looms For sponsor-free episodes of The Indicator from Planet Money, subscribe to Planet Money+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Fact-checking by Sierra Juarez. Music by Drop Electric. Find us: TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Newsletter.

articles.title: Marc Benioff Uses Salesforce Earnings To Warn Against AGI Hype, Dismisses Narrative Of SaaS Becoming Obsolete: 'Nonsense'
articles.summary: Salesforce shares fell after hours despite beating Q2 estimates as CEO Marc Benioff dismissed artificial general intelligence as "nonsense" and emphasized the company's focus on building an "agentic enterprise" instead.
articles.translated_title: Marc Benioff Uses Salesforce Earnings To Warn Against AGI Hype, Dismisses Narrative Of SaaS Becoming Obsolete: 'Nonsense'
articles.translated_summary: Salesforce shares fell after hours despite beating Q2 estimates as CEO Marc Benioff dismissed artificial general intelligence as "nonsense" and emphasized the company's focus on building an "agentic enterprise" instead.

articles.title: The president blamed AI and embraced doing so. Is it becoming the new ‘fake news’?
articles.summary: Politicians are increasingly blaming artificial intelligence to dodge accountability for embarrassing situations.
